text: Robert Francis "Bobcat" Goldthwait (born May 26, 1964) is an American actor, comedian, screenwriter, and director. He is known for his energetic stage personality and his gruff, high-pitched voice. Some movies that he has directed are Sleeping Dogs Lie (2006), World's Greatest Dad (2009) and God Bless America (2011). His voice acting credits include Hercules (1997) and Leroy & Stitch (2006). He has also had guest appearances on television shows like MADtv, Bob's Burgers, Regular Show, Adventure Time, Fish Hooks, Sabrina, the Teenage Witch, Married... with Children and The Simpsons. Goldthwait was born in Syracuse, New York. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1964 births Category:American movie actors Category:American stand-up comedians Category:American television actors Category:American television directors Category:American voice actors Category:Comedians from New York (state) Category:Living people Category:Movie directors from New York (state) Category:Actors from Syracuse, New York Category:Screenwriters from New York (state) Category:Writers from Syracuse, New York
title: Bobcat Goldthwait
